live_updates: Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.

On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.

51138.summary: Some customers in Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51138.title: June 30 – Surrey | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
